title: Salazar. Death Knight.
body:
Salazar is a knight of death, summoning skeleton warriors to crowd and take down enemies as well as gaining stats by killing his enemies.
Melee warrior suitable for Top or jungle.

Hp 563+77 4.89/5 sec +0.88
MP 350 +55 3.68/ 5 sec + 0.59
AD 55.21+3.78
Atk speed 0.666 +0.011
Armor 25 +1.5
MR 25 +1.5
Speed 340

Passive: Necromancy
Killing minions or monsters gain him 0.25 AD 0.2 % atk speed 0.2 Armor and MR. Doubled for large monsters and X5 for epic monsters or champs.
Upon death half the Necromancy stacks are released dealing 20/40/60/80/100/120/140 TD plus 10/16/22/28/34/40/46 TD ( every 3 levels) per soul released. In an area around him. If the killed is killed, he gains back double the stacks and the revive time is reduced by 10/20/30/40% (levels 1/6/11/16)

Q: Death Coil 6.55 sec 60mp
Fires a coil of death that deals 60/70/80/90/100% AD plus 33/66/99/132/165 Magic damage and 4% of their Missing hp. Killing the enemy grants double the amount of Necromancy stacks. And the cool down is reduced to 2 sec.

W: Ravaging Curse 95 mp 27/25/23/21/19 sec.
Curses and enemy for 4 sec. They take 25% AD plus 40/70/100/130/160  as physical damage per second during this time.
If the enemy is slain during this time, a Skeleton Warrior and a Skeleton archer is summoned. Lasts 30
Warrior has
HP 150/225/300/375/450 +20% Salazar's Max hp and AD as HP
AD 20/30/40/50/60 +10% Salazar's AD
Armor & MR 15/25/35/45/55.
Atk speed 0.75
Move speed 335
Archer has
HP 100/150/200/250/300 Hp +10% Salazar's Max hp and AD as HP
AD 45/70/95/120/145 +20% Salazar's AD
Armor and MR 20
Atk speed 1.00
Speed 330

E: Death Pact 80/85/90/95/100mp 37/35/33/31/29sec
Drains the living essence of an enemy dealing 4/5/6/7/8% of the enemies max, current and missing HP as Physical damage and healing Salazar the amount.
Can be cast on Skeletons, releasing them of duty and healing Salazar the skeletons current Hp plus 25/50/75/100/125 +20% AD. If this is done the cool down is reduced by 70%.

R: Realm of the Scourge. 75/100/125 mp 190/180/170 sec.
Passive: Gains 10/15/20 MR, Armor and AD.
Active: Activate to turn a huge area of land under him into the Realm of the Scourge. Enemy units on the land are slowed by 10% and take 10% bonus damage from Salazar. They take 2% max hp as magic damage every second they are on this land. In this zone Salazar is greatly boosted. Gaining 200/400/800 HP heal 1/2/3% max hp/sec
Gains 20/30/40 AD
40/50/60% atk speed.
30/40/50 Armor and MR.
20% speed and 20/30/40% lifesteal and spell vamp.
40% CD and abilities become free to cast in this zone.
Basic attacks and spells (on hit or cast) reduce the cooldown of this spell by 1 sec.
Lasts 10 sec.
